meanings.definition: No definitions found for the word 'racketiest'.
meanings.sent1: The playground was the racketiest place during recess.
meanings.sent2: The city street market was always the racketiest on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The racketiest squirrel in the park kept stealing all the nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the racketiest sound in the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The racketiest fireworks lit up the night sky with bursts of color.
